memories.summary: Key Finding:** Major Tule fog event identified for December 13 morning hours with 85% solar production reduction during critical duck curve period HE09-HE13.
key_observations: Current METAR validates fog risk models with 2°C dewpoint depression and calm winds
Consensus temperature model shows strong agreement between US, European, and Canadian sources
Recovery pattern begins HE14 with clearing fog and normal solar production resuming
decisions_made: Issue CRITICAL fog warning for Dec 13 HE09-HE13 with backup generation staging recommendation
Highlight improving conditions Dec 14-16 for medium-term planning relief
